thread.title: Attend Newberry SC Oktoberfest and Stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites

author: cbs8
title: Attend Newberry SC Oktoberfest and Stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites
text:
Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry, South Carolina offers affordable lodging for Newberry's Oktoberfest celebration on October 3, 2015.
 NEWBERRY, SC, September 30, Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry SC hotel offers affordable lodging for Newberry's annual Oktoberfest celebration on October 3. The German heritage festival will be held in downtown Newberry from 10am-6pm. Admission is free. The Biergarten will offer a variety of German food and beverages. Activities at the family friendly festival include an arts and crafts show, live music, farmers market, classic cars, and a fun zone for the kids.
"We look forward to welcoming visitors to Newberry for Oktoberfest," shares Ambria Lanteigne, General Manager at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites. "The festival is one of Newberry's most popular events," continues Ms. Lanteigne.
The award winning Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry has well appointed guest rooms with free high speed Internet and comfortable Simply Smart beds. Travelers will appreciate the convenience of an in-room microwave and mini refrigerator. The complimentary Express Start Breakfast Bar is a delicious way to start the day. Property amenities include a 24-hour business center, meeting room, fitness facility, and guest laundry. Snacks and beverages may be purchased at the sundry shop in the lobby. The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence for outstanding service.
Current lodging specials at this hotel near downtown Newberry include the Romantic Escape Package. AAA and senior rates are available. IHG Rewards Club members will earn points for their stay. The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry is located off I-26 at Exit 76, near top midlands attractions including the Newberry Opera House and Carter and Holmes Orchids.
For information about Oktoberfest in Newberry, South Carolina, visit www.cityofnewberry.com . To book your stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites [ Newberry South Carolina hotel , call 803-321-3955 or visit www.NEWBERRYSOUTHCAROLINAHOTEL.com .
About Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel Newberry
The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel in Newberry is the premier choice among Newberry South Carolina hotels. They are conveniently located at exit 76 off of I-26, about 30 minutes north of Columbia and less than an hour south of Greenville, SC. This Newberry SC hotel has outstanding amenities, including an indoor pool, whirlpool and Fitness Center. Guest should be sure to stop by their complimentary Express Start Breakfast Bar each morning for delights like their signature cinnamon rolls and Smart Roast coffee. Few other Newberry South Carolina hotels can provide travelers with these perks backed by the reputable name they trust. "Stay Smart" at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel.
For more information visit: http://www.NewberrySouthCarolinaHotel.com
